05-07-2011, 09:17 AM #1 CherokeeParker View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Nov 2007 Posts 14,089 ~Lowe's Home Improvement Stores~Current Mail-In Rebate Offers~ $6 Rebate by mail Purchase 2 or more of: Filtrete Maximum Allergen, Ultra Allergen or Allergen Extra 2pk Filters and receive a rebate check.
To receive your rebate: 1. Purchase 2 or more of: Filtrete Maximum Allergen, Ultra Allergen or Allergen Extra 2pk Filters at a Lowe's Home Improvement Warehouse between 4/1/11 and 6/30/11. Requests must be postmarked by 7/30/11. - Claims postmarked after this date will not be honored. 2. Limit one $6 rebate per household. 3. Please allow 6-8 weeks for processing. If you do not receive your rebate after 8 weeks visit www.lowes.com/rebates , or you may call 1- 877- 204 -1223. 4. Please keep a copy of all materials submitted for your records. 5. Circle the qualifying products purchased on the cash register receipt. 6. Mail this completed certificate along with a photocopy of your cash register receipt.
http://www.lowespromos.com/PDFs/2665-4.pdf
